nodes.label: Draw reversible and irreversible changes (ice melting vs. egg cooking)
Blue square for ice cube with arrows to blue puddle (melting)
White oval with yellow center for egg with arrow to fried egg
Shows ice as solid and water as liquid (reversible change)
Depicts a raw egg turning into a cooked egg (irreversible change)
Confusion with labels and arrows for reversibility of egg
Ensure labels are placed correctly; 'reversible' for ice, 'irreversible' for egg
